name: Battle Bugs Demo (Tese)
description:
This game was inspired by other bullet-hell games such as touhou project or Mushihimesama, while still not as advanced as our inspirations we have taken steps towards making this game unique with it's stand out artstyle and compact gameplay that is ideal for mobile platform.

This project was developed by 6 people:

  • Kacper Smyk (UI Design)
  • Konrad Dziczek (Art)
    https://www.artstation.com/asorangeblossom
  • Krzysztof Kisły (Balancing)
  • Michał Pizoń (Design & Programming)
    https://www.linkedin.com/in/michał-pizoń/
  • Piotr Adamczewski (UI Design & Programming)
    https://twitter.com/Dywanix2137
  • CPX (Art)
    https://twitter.com/CPX_TM
